amendment.description: To authorize a pilot program to explore the use of consumption-based solutions to address software-intensive warfighting capability.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2235 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2235 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4193-4194) To authorize a pilot program to explore the use of consumption-based solutions to address software-intensive warfighting capability.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2235 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2235 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 2301.
